ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Question about crafted weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: According to Yakatizma the trade skill programmer, all race/class/deity combinations will be covered, but the recipes are not all live yet.  There should at
ygData.messageBody:
According to Yakatizma the trade skill programmer, all race/class/deity
combinations will be covered, but the recipes are not all live yet. There
should at some point be a wood elf smithed weapon you can use, or at least a
halfling or gnome one that can be imbued to Bristlebane.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)
[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2000 8:45 PM
To: EQBards
Subject: [eqbards] Question about crafted weapons


Wood elven blacksmiths can craft Mithril Fier'dal weapons. These items are
deity items linked to Tunare. My bard is a wood elf but I chose Bristlebane
since I figured the god of rogues was more fitting for a bard than Tunare.
So does that mean I can not equip these weapons since I don't worship
Tunare? And if I can't equip weapons crafted by wood elves, could I equip
deity weapons crafted by halflings who worship Bristlebane?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
